question: The three-day National Tribal Dance Festival is conducted in which of the following cities?
explanation: The three-day National Tribal Dance Festival, for the first time, is conducted in Raipur, the capital of Chhattisgarh. More than 1300 participants from 25 states and UTs of India and 6 other nations are participating in this event. During this event, 29 tribal troupes will present more than 43 styles of four different dance forms.
